_metadata.note: MLB 마케팅 스킬용 브랜드 DNA - mlb_director_dna.json에서 추출

preferred_locations: 깨끗하고 심플한 도시 거리 (다른 사람 없음)
background_rules: 배경에 다른 사람이 절대 등장하면 안 됨
environment_guide.style_direction: MLB는 심플하고 고급스럽고 모던한 스트릿 느낌. 깨끗하고 고급 힙. 감성적이거나 복잡한 배경 금지.

mandatory_rules: 절대 흑백 이미지 생성 금지 - 반드시 풀컬러로 생성
color_guide.color_temperature: neutral (64.3%) 또는 cool (35.1%), warm 색온도는 피할 것
color_guide.saturation_direction: 약간 채도를 낮출 수 있으나 (-2.6 avg) 절대 흑백이나 무채색으로 가면 안 됨

director_guidelines.camera_guide:
## MLB Camera Setup
- Primary Lens: 50 (alternatives: 50, 35, 85)
- Aperture: f/2.8 (alternatives: f/2.8, f/2.0, f/4.0)
- Camera Height: avg 9.8 (range: 5 to 20) cm relative to eye level
- Horizontal Angle: avg 12.2 (range: 0 to 30)° from front
- Distance: avg 2.8 (range: 1.5 to 3) meters
director_guidelines.pose_guide:
## MLB Pose Direction
- Primary Style: confident_standing
- Energy Level: avg 3.0 (range: 1 to 6) (1-10 scale)
- Torso Rotation: avg 5.6 (range: -15 to 45)° from camera
- Shoulder Tilt: avg -1.5 (range: -5 to 5)°
- Common Left Arm: hand on hip, hand in pocket, relaxed at side
- Common Right Arm: hand in pocket, relaxed at side, hand on hip
- Hand Gestures: fingers relaxed, slightly curved, slightly curled, holding bag strap, touching face
- Weight Distribution: left 50%, right 50%, left 55%, right 45%, left 60%, right 40%
director_guidelines.expression_guide:
## MLB Expression Direction
- Primary Expression: cool
- Intensity: avg 4.2 (range: 1 to 6) (1-10 scale)
- Mouth State: closed_neutral (closed_neutral, lips_parted, slight_smile)
- Eye Openness: avg 80.2 (range: 70 to 85)%
- Gaze Direction: avg -0.2 (range: -10 to 30)° horizontal
- Vibe: mysterious (mysterious, approachable, sophisticated)
director_guidelines.composition_guide:
## MLB Composition
- Primary Framing: MS
- Subject Position: center horizontal
- Depth of Field: moderate
- Headroom: avg 10.3 (range: 10 to 20)%
- Background Blur: avg 37.8 (range: 0 to 70)%
director_guidelines.lighting_guide:
## MLB Lighting
- Primary Light: softbox
- Quality: soft_diffused
- Direction: avg 45.0 (range: 40 to 45)° (0=front)
- Shadow Intensity: avg 30.8 (range: 20 to 60)%
- Color Temperature: avg 5565.6 (range: 4500 to 6500)K
- Golden Hour Usage: no(99.4%), yes(0.6%)
director_guidelines.color_grade_guide:
## MLB Color Grading
- Temperature: neutral
- Look: clean_digital
- Saturation: avg -2.6 (range: -10 to 5) adjustment
- Contrast: avg 4.4 (range: 0 to 5) adjustment
- Film Grain: avg 2.7 (range: 0 to 5)%
- Shadow Tone: neutral, blue
- Highlight Tone: neutral, cyan, yellow
director_guidelines.brand_vibe_guide:
## MLB Brand Vibe
- Era Aesthetic: modern_2020s
- Energy Level: avg 4.2 (range: 3 to 6) (1-10)
- Sophistication: avg 5.0 (range: 4 to 8) (1-10)
- Street Cred: avg 6.4 (range: 4 to 7) (1-10)
- Mood Keywords: cool, casual, youthful, urban, stylish, confident, sporty, relaxed, modern, trendy
director_guidelines.signature_elements_guide:
## MLB Signature Elements
- Signature Poses: hands in pockets, slight torso rotation with direct gaze, hand in pocket, hands on hips, hand on hip with bag
- Signature Styling: cat ear beanie, baseball cap with logo, mix of baseball team apparel, baseball cap and sporty jacket, mix of sporty and casual wear
- Signature Moods: effortless cool, Effortless cool, understated cool, cool confidence, youthful playfulness
